name: The "Arrested Development" Pilot Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Tobias and Lindsay move to so that they could host fundraisers?
questions.explanation:
Boston.

	In an act of defiance, Lindsay married Tobias Funke and moved to Boston with him where they hosted fundraisers such as "Stop the Hunger", and "HOOP".

questions.text: Who is not on the boat during George's retirement party?
questions.explanation:
Tobias.

	Unwittingly, Tobias thought that the party was pirate themed and got into a van of garishly dressed men where he became a part of the homosexual protest boat that was interrupting the retirement party.

questions.text: What is the name of the housing project that the Bluth Company is operating?
questions.explanation:
Sudden Valley.

	Michael and his son, George Michael, live in the attic of the model home so that people can still walk through the house.  Sudden Valley remains the Bluth household throughout the shows.

questions.text: What is not paid for by the Bluth Company?
questions.explanation:
Michael's new suit.

	Buster has taken classes in many things including the cartography lessons, and even Native American tribal ceremonies.  Lindsay had been staying in her hotel room with her family for over a month without Michael knowing.

questions.text: Who does George Sr. make the new CEO of the Bluth Company?
questions.explanation:
Lucille.

	George Sr. makes Lucille the new CEO because he thinks that a husband and wife can't be arrested for the same crime.  If he did make Michael the CEO, Michael would go to jail for being an accomplice.

questions.text: What does Tobias want to become?
questions.explanation:
An actor.

	Tobias is inspired after discovering that most of the homosexuals were in a theatre club, so he decides that he would be a good actor.

questions.text: Who does Maeby kiss to get her parents mad?
questions.explanation:
George Michael.

	George Michael and Maeby are cousins, so Maeby thinks that they should kiss.  This way, their parents would think that they should be around each there more often.  Her mother misses the kiss and no one finds out.

questions.text: Where does Michael want to move?
questions.explanation:
Arizona.

	Michael decides that his family doesn't need him after he doesn't become the CEO of the Bluth Company.  He even gets a job with a rival development company, but his family convinces him to stay home.

questions.text: Who "takes inventory" of the model home?
questions.explanation:
Lindsay.

	While Lindsay comes across something she likes, she runs into George Michael who shows his dad that he'd rather be with his family.  Michael and George Michael stay in L.A. with Maeby, Tobias, and Lindsay.

questions.text: What game does the family play in the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Monopoly.

	Ironically, the family plays a game which reflects what happens to the family.  The dad is sent to jail, and the whole game has to do with properties and money (just like the Bluth Company).
